ValidationRule.description: To prevent us from attaching new entries to old membership contracts.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Date__c > Membership_Contract__r.End_Date__c && $User.Id <> '00530000003A32O' /*Paul Harney*/ && $User.Id <> '005a0000007Wamb' /*Jeff Fahndrich*/ && $User.Id <> '00530000001YEiF' /*Jennifer Valdez*/ && $User.Id <> '0055Y00000I0fox' /*Jennifer Brenner*/ && $User.Id <> '00530000003biB7' /*Rebecca Johnson*/
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot create a schedule past the membership contract's End Date.
